scripts.init:local: cp -n .env.local.example .env.local && pnpm install && pnpm run local:edgedb:init
scripts.start:docker: pnpm run docker:clean && pnpm run docker:up
scripts.local:edgedb:init: edgedb project init; pnpm run local:edgedb:migrate
scripts.local:edgedb:migrate: edgedb migration create; edgedb migrate; pnpm run edgedb:generate
scripts.docker:up: pnpm run docker-compose up --detach && pnpm run docker-compose logs -f
scripts.docker:up:force: pnpm run docker-compose build --force-rm --no-cache && pnpm run docker:up
scripts.docker:server:restart: pnpm run docker:clean && pnpm run docker-compose up --build --no-deps --detach server
scripts.docker:edgedb:restart: pnpm run docker:clean && pnpm run docker-compose up --build --no-deps --detach edgedb
scripts.docker:edgedb:destroy: read -p 'Destroy EdgeDB Docker volume? (y/N): ' confirm && [[ $confirm == [yY] ]] && pnpm run docker-compose down edgedb && rm -rf edgedb-data || echo 'Operation cancelled'
scripts.docker:edgedb:cli: source .env.docker && pnpm run docker-compose exec edgedb edgedb --dsn ${EDGEDB_DSN} --tls-security insecure
scripts.edgedb:generate: pnpm exec generate edgeql-js && pnpm exec generate interfaces && pnpm exec generate edgeql-js --target ts
scripts.test: pnpm run test:integration && pnpm run test:unit
